title: Deion Sanders at risk of losing left foot to amputation
description: University of Colorado head football coach and NFL Hall of Famer Deion Sanders, who has previously had two toes amputated, now faces the risk of losing his left foot due to ongoing blood circulation issues.

title: Collapsed stretch of Interstate 95 in Philadelphia to reopen within 2 weeks, governor says
description: The collapsed stretch of Interstate 95 in Philadelphia will reopen within two weeks, Pennsylvania’s governor said Saturday, after joining President Joe Biden on a helicopter tour over the critical stretch of highway closed to East Coast traffic since last weekend.

title: The ‘whatabout Biden’ defense: What are the allegations made by Trump to deflect from indictment?
description: Republicans are raising uncorroborated allegations about Joe Biden and Hunter Biden to deflect from former President Donald Trump federal indictment.

title: Mike Pence: Donald Trump has been 'walking away' from conservative principles
description: Mike Pence criticized Donald Trump's position on abortion and the national debt, accusing his old boss of drifting away from conservative principles.

title: Homeowners in states hobbled by extreme weather are running out of options to protect their homes
description: In California, there have been eight disaster events since 2020 totaling between $20 billion and $50 billion in damages combined. It's worse in Florida.

title: People are still being awful on flights, and no one really knows why
description: Recent data on fliers' conduct in the skies shows carriers are still dealing with high levels of bad behavior, long after mask mandates were scrapped.

title: Disease screening for newborns varies by state. For some, that means diagnoses come too late.
description: The lists of diseases for which newborns are tested vary by state. Parents of kids with Krabbe disease, which requires early intervention, are pushing to change state and federal policies.

title: Tori Bowie’s death shows how pervasive racial disparities are in maternal health
description: The death of Olympic track and field star Tori Bowie, who died of pregnancy complications last month, has prompted questions about how a seemingly healthy, financially stable person could face such a tragic outcome.

title: Secure bathrooms to 'not a spy': Here's how Republicans are defending Trump
description: A number of Republicans rushed to Donald Trump's defense after his indictment in the classified documents investigation.

title: Religious protesters gather outside Dodger Stadium on Pride Night
description: With “stop anti-Catholic hate” and "God will not be mocked” signs, protesters surrounded the main entrance to Dodger Stadium on Friday hours before The Sisters of Perpetual Indulgence were to receive an award on LGBTQ Pride Night.
